identity.name: E1_Control_Room
identity.core_philosophy: Precision through Chaos. The interface is a cockpit for developers.

usage_rules.primary: Use Electric Cyan (#00E5FF) for primary actions, active states, and key data points. NEVER use generic teal.
usage_rules.secondary: Use Acid Lime (#CCFF00) for 'Success', 'Running', and 'Online' indicators.
usage_rules.destructive: Use Neon Red (#FF2E63) for 'Failed', 'Error', and 'Bug' indicators.
usage_rules.background: Deep Void Black (#0A0A0B). Avoid pure black (#000000).
usage_rules.gradients: Avoid full gradients. Use 'Glow' effects: radial-gradient(circle at center, var(--primary) 0%, transparent 70%) with low opacity.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Dense data grids use p-4.

grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid: grid-cols-12 gap-4. Widgets span 3, 4, or 6 columns. Full height stretch.
grid_system.landing: Tetris Grid: Asymmetrical bento box. Mix tall (row-span-2) and wide (col-span-2) elements.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/40 border border-white/10 (Use for Nav and Floating Panels)
visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Animated gradient border for active test execution cards.
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Subtle repeating-linear-gradient(transparent 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 50%) background-size: 100% 4px; (Use for Log Viewer)
visual_enhancers.glow: box-shadow: 0 0 20px -5px var(--primary) (Use for active buttons and status indicators)

customization_rules.Card: Remove shadow. Add 1px border (border-white/10). Hover: border-primary/50.
customization_rules.Button: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). Primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,229,255,0.5)].
customization_rules.Table: Compact. Header: text-muted-foreground uppercase tracking-wider text-xs. Row hover: bg-white/5.

LogViewer.style: Terminal aesthetic. Black bg, green/white text. Auto-scroll.

TestStatusIndicator.style: Pulsing dot (animate-ping) + Solid dot. Green for Running, Red for Failed.

team_context.usage: About/Team Section or Dashboard Empty State

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ANY data, numbers, or code snippets.
Dashboard must be dense. Avoid excessive whitespace in data grids.
Use 'Electric Cyan' (#00E5FF) sparingly for impact. Do not overuse.
Implement a 'Live' feel using pulsing indicators for real-time data.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance tool. Prioritize rendering speed and data density. The UI should feel like a futuristic HUD. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. For the dashboard, rely on CSS-based visuals (borders, glows) rather than images to keep it lightweight.
